org.apache.nutch.metadata

Interface Nutch

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Metadata, SpellCheckedMetadata

    public interface Nutch
    A collection of Nutch internal metadata constants.
    Author:
    Chris Mattmann, Jérôme Charron
